sentences.sentence: Six wethers of Inner Mongolia crossbred sheep fitted with Permanent cannulae into the rumen and duodenum were used.
sentences.translation: 选用六只装有永久性瘤胃和十二指肠瘤管的成年半细毛羊进行试验。

sentences.sentence: The effect of selective vagotomy of the abomasum, pylorus, duodenum and liver on insulin release during the cephalic phase of digestion was investigated in wethers and lactating ewes.
sentences.translation: 研究了阉羊和母羊选择性皱胃、幽门、十二指肠和肝迷走神经切断术对消化头期的胰岛素分泌的影响。
